name: Dungeon Time
description:
A sorcerer known as the Prophet has spilled Chaos into the world. Four weathered adventurers must track him down and find out if it was just a misunderstanding or if the world is really going to end.

Dungeon Time features arcade quality gaming with a sprinkle of smooth mobile controls. Crawl with up to 4 players Co-Op or go just go it alone. Homage to RPG & shmup classics - a top-down shooter with zombies, wizards, demons, and exploding owls.

Minimum Recommended
- iPhone 5/iPad4/Mini 2 and above (please don't use iPhone 4S or Mini 1)

This game contains no in-apps or ads.

It is in fact, a single player game first with the option of online co-op.

You do not need an internet connection to play the single player mode.

Features
- 4 Heroes (+skins) with unique magic & purpose
- Up to 4 Player Co-Op multiplayer!
- Mobile auto-target controls
- 11 stages including random generated monsters & maps
- 40 enemies (nobody wants to play the same enemy over and over)
- 10 boss encounters
- Strangely satisfying ragdolls
- Cloud saving
- Music by Matthew Pablo
- Universal app designed for iPhone & iPad

Quality settings benchmark:
- Fast (iPhone5/iPad 4)
- Medium (iPhone 5S/Mini2)
- Best (iPhone6/Mini4/Air)

Feel free to rate, share with others and drop us a comment.
